Teaching Assistantship

During my PhD, I TAed for the following courses:

  • Programming II (1st year undergraduate programming course), 2010
  • Software Engineering (3rd year undergraduate software engineering course), 2011-2013
  • Principles of Computer Systems (Graduate level systems course), 2014
